entry.tran: 心理失调的;不能适应环境的;适应不良的
entry.def: If you describe a child as maladjusted, you mean that they have psychological problems and behave in a way which is not acceptable to society.

example.tran: 为心理失调的儿童开设的学校

means.word_mean: 1. poorly adjusted to demands and stresses of daily living;
2. emotionally unstable and having difficulty coping with personal relationships
（指人）心理失调的;不适应环境的
